name: 演化論
description: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解演化學之理論及各種演化現象形成之原因與其過程，並能初步認知演化假說的形成及理論基礎。教學目標亦希望能達成校訂相關之基本素養及系訂相關之核心能力之養成。
goals: 使學生瞭解演化學之理論及各種演化現象形成之原因與其過程
syllabus:
Evolutionary biology Concepts

Genetic tools for evolutionary research

Evolution of Genes and Genomes

Origin of Genetic Variation

Genetic variation and population genetics

Classification and Phylogeny

Patterns of Evolution

Genetical Theory of Natural Selection

Midterm examination

Genetic Drift: Evolution at random

Natural selection and adaptation

Phenotypes and the Evolution of Quantitative Traits

Geography of Evolution

Species and Species Concepts; Reproductive Isolation; Hybridization

Speciation Modes and Speciation

Coevolution

Sex and Reproductive Success

Final exam
